org.openscience.cdk.group

Class AbstractEquitablePartitionRefiner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.group.AbstractEquitablePartitionRefiner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtomEquitablePartitionRefiner, BondEquitablePartitionRefiner

    public abstract class AbstractEquitablePartitionRefiner
extends Object
    Refines a 'coarse' partition (with more blocks) to a 'finer' partition that is equitable. Closely follows algorithm 7.5 in CAGES [Kreher, Donald and Stinson, Douglas, Combinatorial Algorithms Generation Enumeration and Search, 1998, CRC Press]. The basic idea is that the refiner maintains a queue of blocks to refine, starting with all the initial blocks in the partition to refine. These blocks are popped off the queue, and
    Author:
    maclean
    Belongs to CDK module:
    group

      Nested Classes

      static class  AbstractEquitablePartitionRefiner.SplitOrder
      A forward split order tends to favor partitions where the cells are refined from lowest to highest.
